column2: title=e Origins of Tolkien's Middle-earth For Dummies
image=[[Image:The Origins of Tolkien's Middle-earth for Dummies.jpg

column1: '''''The Origins of Tolkien's Middle-earth For Dummies''''' is a 2003 book.

column2: Don't know [[Gollum]] from [[Gandalf]]? This plain-English guide helps you make sense of the creatures, language, geography, and richly detailed history of the fascinating world of [[Middle-earth]]. From the [[The Shire
column5: Ringwraiths]], you'll discover the varied sources and inspirations behind Tolkien's stories and comprehend the meanings that lie beneath the surface.}}
